name: F.O.G (L'extinction des saisons)
description:
Description :
En:
this is a platformer with auto-runner elements made initially for the Arcadia corp game jam, with the theme "loop".

Fr:
Ceci est un jeu de plateforme qui contient des elements d'auto-runner, et a été créé initialement pour la game jam d’Arcadia corp, qui avais pour theme "loop" (boucle).

Commands: 
Level 1 : 
. Left/Right  -> A / D (qwerty) or Q / D (azerty) : 
. Jump/Saut -> W (qwerty) or Z (azerty) or space 
. Slide/glissade -> S

Level 2 :
. Jump/Saut -> W (qwerty) or Z (azerty) or space 
. Slide/glissade -> S
. Power of Season -> clic gauche (left clic) n'importe où sur l'écran lors de passage en dessous de feuille. 

Translation:
Intro:
The big tree watch over time and the seasons
One day, the fog stole the seasons and hid them around the world, freezing time and plunging it in sadness and despair.
As guardian, you must find the seasons, fight the fog, and restore time.

Text at the end of level 1:
You found autumn, flee the fog and bring the season back where it belong.
(you're now in the autorun phase, the character will automatically go left, dodge the obstacles and use autumn's power to get back to the big tree)
